description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Motocross High Definition. Race your dirtbike against 3 computer controlled bikes on 5 different racetracks. The bike handling is amazing with the bike power-sliding in turns and the suspensions absorbing every bump on the track.  Many stunts allowed including back flip, front flip and many more. Impressive crashes. Controllable camera. Original Soundtrack.
